metadata.title: CVE-2016-4117 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Adobe Flash Player 21.0.0.226 and earlier allows remote attackers toexecute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors, as exploited in the wild inMay 2016.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4117` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 11.2.202.621ubuntu0.14.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 11.2.202.621ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '11.2.202.621ubuntu0.14.04.1').
